content.query:
DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[cdc_Incubation_Azure_target]
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE PROC [dbo].[cdc_Incubation_Azure_target] AS
BEGIN
 update dbo.Incubation_Azure_target 
 set date_time =stg.date_time             
  ,site_name=stg.site_name                   
  ,posa_continent=stg.posa_continent            
  ,user_location_country=stg.user_location_country    
  ,user_location_region=stg.user_location_region    
  ,user_location_city=stg.user_location_city       
  ,orig_destination_distance=stg.orig_destination_distance
  ,user_id=stg.user_id           
  ,is_mobile=stg.is_mobile                
  ,is_package=stg.is_package                
  ,channel= stg.channel                 
  ,srch_ci= stg.srch_ci                 
  ,srch_co= stg.srch_co                  
  ,srch_adults_cnt= stg.srch_adults_cnt           
  ,srch_children_cnt=  stg.srch_children_cnt        
  ,srch_rm_cnt=  stg.srch_rm_cnt              
  ,srch_destination_id= stg.srch_destination_id       
  ,srch_destination_type_id= stg.srch_destination_type_id
  ,hotel_id=stg.hotel_id
  from
 (select src.id
   ,src.date_time                  
  ,src.site_name                  
  ,src.posa_continent             
  ,src.user_location_country      
  ,src.user_location_region       
  ,src.user_location_city         
  ,src.orig_destination_distance  
  ,src.user_id                    
  ,src.is_mobile                  
  ,src.is_package                 
  ,src.channel                    
  ,src.srch_ci                    
  ,src.srch_co                    
  ,src.srch_adults_cnt            
  ,src.srch_children_cnt          
  ,src.srch_rm_cnt                
  ,src.srch_destination_id        
  ,src.srch_destination_type_id   
  ,src.hotel_id
 from dbo.expedia_hotel src
 inner join dbo.Incubation_Azure_target tgt
 on src.id=tgt.id
 where (src.date_time <>  tgt.date_time  or        
src.site_name     <> tgt.site_name   or          
src.posa_continent      <>      tgt.posa_continent or 
src.user_location_country    <> tgt.user_location_country  or
src.user_location_region   <> tgt.user_location_region or   
src.user_location_city     <>   tgt.user_location_city or 
src.orig_destination_distance <> tgt.orig_destination_distance or
src.user_id  <> tgt.user_id          or       
src.is_mobile   <> tgt.is_mobile  or            
src.is_package  <> tgt.is_package or              
src.channel    <> tgt.channel    or            
cast(src.srch_ci  as nvarchar)  <> cast(tgt.srch_ci  as nvarchar)  or           
cast(src.srch_co  as nvarchar)    <> cast(tgt.srch_co  as nvarchar)     or          
src.srch_adults_cnt    <> tgt.srch_adults_cnt  or     
src.srch_children_cnt  <> tgt.srch_children_cnt      or 
src.srch_rm_cnt         <> tgt.srch_rm_cnt   or   
src.srch_destination_id    <> tgt.srch_destination_id   or
src.srch_destination_type_id  <> tgt.srch_destination_type_id or
src.hotel_id <> tgt.hotel_id))stg
where stg.id=dbo.Incubation_Azure_target.id;

insert into dbo.Incubation_Azure_target
select 
   src.id
   ,src.date_time                  
  ,src.site_name                  
  ,src.posa_continent             
  ,src.user_location_country      
  ,src.user_location_region       
  ,src.user_location_city         
  ,src.orig_destination_distance  
  ,src.user_id                    
  ,src.is_mobile                  
  ,src.is_package                 
  ,src.channel                    
  ,src.srch_ci                    
  ,src.srch_co                    
  ,src.srch_adults_cnt            
  ,src.srch_children_cnt          
  ,src.srch_rm_cnt                
  ,src.srch_destination_id        
  ,src.srch_destination_type_id   
  ,src.hotel_id
 from dbo.expedia_hotel src
 left join dbo.Incubation_Azure_target tgt
 on src.id=tgt.id
 where tgt.id is null;
 
 
END;
GO
